content:
I don't have an org, it's a personal account (I think, I didn't see org ID. I will set up a formal business/org for next NOVA deployment though.

jesselarose@Jesses-MacBook-Pro palios-taey-nova % ./scripts/apply_infrastructure.sh --create-project=true --billing-account=012796-3C9A41-E282F5012796-3C9A41-E282F5 --environment=dev
Unknown option: --create-project=true
Usage: ./scripts/apply_infrastructure.sh [options]
Options:
  -p, --project-id       The GCP project ID to deploy resources (default: palios-taey-{ENVIRONMENT})
  -r, --region           The GCP region for resources (default: us-central1)
  -e, --environment      The environment (dev, staging, prod) (default: dev)
  -c, --create-project   Whether to create a new project (true/false) (default: false)
  -o, --org-id           The GCP organization ID (required if create-project is true)
  -b, --billing-account  The GCP billing account ID (required if create-project is true)
  -h, --help             Show this help message
jesselarose@Jesses-MacBook-Pro palios-taey-nova %
